item.title: About me
item.description: This is Issey Sukeda. Currently, I am a PhD student under the supervision of Prof. Tomonari Sei and Prof. Takeru Matsuda. My interest covers statistics and operations research. My full publications can be accessed from Publication. Any collaboration, job offer, or discussion is welcome ! ğŸ”¥ News Dec. 2025 ğŸ‰ Our paper was accepted in ACM Multimedia Asia 2025 Workshop! Oct. 2025 ğŸ‰ Two papers were accepted in IJCNLP-AACL 2025 Main conference!
